org.sakaiproject.time.api

Interface TimeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicTimeService, ConversionTimeService

    public interface TimeService

    TimeService ...

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String APPLICATION_ID
      The type string for this "application": should not change over time as it may be stored in various parts of persistent entities.
      static String TIMEZONE_KEY
      Preferences key for user's time zone

      • newTimeGmt

        Time newTimeGmt(int year,
              int month,
              int day,
              int hour,
              int minute,
              int second,
              int millisecond)
        Deprecated. the use of time is discouraged in favour of java.util.Date. This interface will be removed in 2.0
        Get a time object, set from individual ints, Gmt values
        Parameters:
        year - full year (i.e. 1999, 2000)
        month - month in year (1..12)
        day - day in month (1..31)
        hour - hour in day (0..23)
        minute - minute in hour (0..59)
        second - second in minute (0..59)
        millisecond - millisecond in second (0..999)
        Returns:
        A time object.

        Parameters:
        breakdown - The time breakdown values.
        Returns:
        A time object.

        month - month in year (1..12)
        day - day in month (1..31)
        hour - hour in day (0..23)
        minute - minute in hour (0..59)
        second - second in minute (0..59)
        millisecond - millisecond in second (0..999)
        Returns:
        A TimeBreakdown.

      • newTimeRange

        TimeRange newTimeRange(Time start,
                     Time end,
                     boolean startIncluded,
                     boolean endIncluded)
        Deprecated. the use of time is discouraged in favour of java.util.Date. This interface will be removed in 2.0
        Get a TimeRange, from parts.
        Parameters:
        start - The start Time.
        end - The end Time.
        startIncluded - true if start is part of the range, false if not.
        endIncluded - true of end is part of the range, false if not.
        Returns:
        A TimeRange.

                     long duration)

        Parameters:

        duration - The long milliseconds duration.
        Returns:
        A TimeRange.

        Parameters:
        start - The start time.
        end - The end time.
        Returns:

      • getCalendar

        GregorianCalendar getCalendar(TimeZone zone,
                            int year,
                            int month,
                            int day,
                            int hour,
                            int min,
                            int second,
                            int ms)
        Get a Calendar, set to this zone and these values.
        Parameters:
        zone - The TimeZone for the calendar.
        year - full year (i.e. 1999, 2000)
        month - month in year (1..12)
        day - day in month (1..31)
        hour - hour in day (0..23)
        min - minute in hour (0..59)
        second - second in minute (0..59)
        ms - millisecond in second (0..999)

      • different

        boolean different(Time a,
                Time b)
        Deprecated. the use of time is discouraged in favour of java.util.Date. This interface will be removed in 2.0
        Compare two Time for differences, either may be null
        Parameters:
        a - One Time.
        b - The other Time.
        Returns:
        true if the Times are different, false if they are the same.
